nodes.text: The Kashyyyk oil refinery was a structure near the city of Kachirho on the planet Kashyyyk. During the Battle of Kashyyyk, Separatist forces attempted to destroy the refinery, aiming to cut off the Wookiees' fuel supply, but they ultimately failed.
Prior to its first canonical appearance in Star Wars: Galactic Defense, the refinery was featured in the Star Wars Legends video game Star Wars: Battlefront II.
